means: 苹果等切碎混拌碎肉的东西，甜馅

sentence.Network_en: I can imagine a defence lawyer making mincemeat of him if we ever put him up in court.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是我们让他出庭，我能够想象出辩护律师把他驳斥得体无完肤的情形。

sentence.Network_en: The Prime Minister made mincemeat of his opponent's arguments.
sentence.Network_cn: 首相把对方反对他的论点驳得体无完肤.

sentence.Network_en: He was gobbling mincemeat, meat bone, bread and cheese, all at once.
sentence.Network_cn: 他就把碎肉 、 肉骨头 、 面包和乳酪一古脑儿往嘴里塞.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)defeat someone decisively or easily in a fight, contest, or argument
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)揍扁；彻底击溃；把…驳得体无完肤

lj.lj_ly: made mincemeat of the opponent's argument.
lj.lj_ls: 把反对者驳得无言以对

entry.tran: 百果馅（用切碎的干果混合而成，用于制百果馅饼）
entry.def: Mincemeat is a sticky mixture of small pieces of dried fruit. It is usually cooked in pastry to make mince pies.
Mincemeat is the same as mince .

entry.tran: (在辩论、打斗、竞争中)彻底击败，把…打得落花流水
entry.def: If you make mincemeat of someone or make mincemeat out of them, you defeat them completely in an argument, fight, or competition.

example.ex: I can imagine a defence lawyer making mincemeat of him if we ever put him up in court.
example.tran: 要是我们让他出庭，我能够想象出辩护律师把他驳斥得体无完肤的情形。
